LanguageData.AvaliGraphene.label: woven graphene
LanguageData.AvaliGraphene.description: Graphene that's been woven specially for use in Avali crafting stations.
LanguageData.AvaliAerogel.label: Aerogel
LanguageData.AvaliAerogel.description: Aerogel is an ephemeral lattice of molecules with incredible structural properties, despite weighing next to nothing.
LanguageData.AvaliNanoFibre.label: nanofibre
LanguageData.AvaliNanoFibre.description: A superstrong and ultralight synthetic fabric.
